description: A curved, notched blade that looks like a tool for gutting large fish.
story: Perseus found this wedged in the hull of an old wreck. He uses it to scale fish, but the blade never seems to dull.
image_description: A sickle-sword with a crescent blade and salt-stained leather wrapping.
back_story: The adamantine scythe used by Cronus, gifted to Perseus by Hermes to decapitate Medusa.

abilities.name: Ichor Slice
abilities.effect: Deals massive damage to Immortal-type enemies.

description: A circular piece of bronze, once used as a cover for a grain barrel.
story: Fisher uses this to signal other boats. He avoids looking directly into it at night.
image_description: A shimmering bronze shield. A smoky face of a woman with snakes for hair ripples under the surface.
back_story: Athena's personal shield. It reflects the inner darkness of those who look at it.

abilities.name: Gorgon's Gaze
abilities.effect: Chance to petrify enemies on successful block.

description: Old leather sandals with small, molting feathers stitched into the heels.
story: Fisher often finds himself jumping much further than a mortal man should be able to.
image_description: Classic sandals with three wings on each heel that flutter with golden light.
back_story: The winged boots of the Messenger God, clipped by Mnemosyne's curse.

abilities.name: Sky-Step
abilities.effect: Allows for infinite double-jumps and brief flight.

description: A simple, stained sack used for carrying bait. It never seems to get full.
story: Fisher once fit a whole shark inside it and the bag stayed light as a feather.
image_description: A burlap sack with gold embroidery in the pattern of an Ouroboros.
back_story: A magical wallet designed to contain things that cannot be held by mortal hands.

abilities.name: Void Storage
abilities.effect: Can 'capture' and store enemy projectiles to fire back later.

description: A waterlogged wooden chest with rusted iron bands.
story: Perseus feels a strange sense of safety when sleeping inside this old box.
image_description: A cedar chest showing carvings of Zeus's golden rain when cleaned.
back_story: The chest that protected Perseus and his mother during their exile at sea.

abilities.name: Cradle of the Storm
abilities.effect: Become invulnerable for 5 seconds when health drops below 10%.

description: A smooth, semi-translucent stone that feels warm to the touch.
story: Fisher found this inside an oyster. He uses it to see through the morning fog.
image_description: A cataract-clouded glass orb that projects a beam of pure white light.
back_story: The single eye of the Three Gray Sisters, stolen to force their secrets.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.effect: Slows time briefly to highlight enemy weak points.

description: A piece of parchment that appears blank or salt-stained.
story: Fisher uses it to navigate reefs that aren't on any other sailor's charts.
image_description: Ancient parchment with flowing liquid silver ink that moves like clouds.
back_story: A tool created by the Titaness to keep Perseus lost in his own mind.

abilities.name: Labyrinth Walk
abilities.effect: Instantly teleport to any previously visited memory shrine.

description: A small, hand-carved owl. Crude and simple.
story: A gift from an orphan. Sometimes Fisher hears it hooting warnings.
image_description: A wooden owl that transforms into a mechanical golden sentinel.
back_story: A hidden avatar of Athena's wisdom sent to watch over the amnesiac hero.

abilities.name: Owl's Wisdom
abilities.effect: Highlights the solution to environmental puzzles.

description: A jagged piece of black granite. Incredibly heavy.
story: Fisher uses this as a boat anchor. Only he is strong enough to lift it.
image_description: Dark granite pulsing with a low, gravitational hum.
back_story: A physical manifestation of the grudge Atlas holds against the hero.

abilities.name: World-Weight
abilities.effect: Slam the ground to create a gravity well that pulls enemies in.

description: A small bronze locket containing a braid of golden hair.
story: The only thing Fisher has from before his 'accident.' It smells of jasmine.
image_description: Heart-shaped bronze locket that glows softly when near danger.
back_story: A lock of hair from his mother, representing his tie to his humanity.

abilities.name: Motherly Embrace
abilities.effect: Consumable: Fully restores health and resets all cooldowns.

description: A heavy, dark wool cap that covers the eyes. It feels cold.
story: Fisher wears this to block out the harsh sun, but noticed that people tend to ignore him when he has it on.
image_description: An obsidian-black helmet with a faceplate like a skull, shimmering with shadowy smoke.
back_story: Hades' own helmet, lent to Perseus to infiltrate the Gorgon's lair.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.effect: Become completely invisible and silent for 10 seconds.

description: A burlap-wrapped object that is terrifyingly heavy and smells of sulfur.
story: Fisher found this in a cave. He keeps it wrapped because just touching the bundle makes his skin feel like it's turning to chalk.
image_description: A decapitated head with writhing serpents for hair, eyes glowing with a sickly green light.
back_story: The ultimate trophy. Even in death, the Gorgon's gaze is a weapon of mass destruction.

abilities.name: Petrifying Scream
abilities.effect: Unwrap the head to instantly turn all low-level enemies in front of you to stone.

description: A gnarled olive wood staff with two vines entwined around it.
story: A traveler left this behind. It seems to help Fisher walk for miles without tiring.
image_description: A golden staff with two silver serpents coiled around a central wing motif.
back_story: A shard of Hermes' staff. It bridges the gap between the living world and the world of memories.

abilities.name: Messenger's Status
abilities.effect: Cures all debuffs and grants a brief speed boost.

description: A three-pronged fishing spear, heavily corroded by sea salt.
story: The most effective tool Fisher owns. It seems to pull the water toward it when thrown.
image_description: A massive, gleaming celestial bronze trident head attached to a new shaft.
back_story: A gift from Poseidon to his nephew, intended to help him tame the sea monster Cetus.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: Call a wave of water to knock back and drown enemies.

description: A ceramic mask shaped like an owl's face, split down the middle.
story: Fisher wears this during festivals. It makes him feel like he can see things before they happen.
image_description: A regal marble mask that glows with blue intellectual energy when worn.
back_story: An artifact used by Athena's priests to commune with her tactical mind.

abilities.name: Tactical Analysis
abilities.effect: Pauses combat to allow the player to see enemy HP, weaknesses, and next moves.

description: A sharp, curved tooth from an unknown beast.
story: Fisher found this in the belly of a shark. He uses it as a dagger when his net fails.
image_description: A foot-long tooth from a Gray Sister, dripping with purple mnemonic ink.
back_story: A tooth from the Graeae, containing the memories of a thousand years of history.

abilities.name: Sunder Mind
abilities.effect: Stabbing an enemy forces them to drop extra Memory Shards.

description: Heavy iron manacles that feel like they are still holding someone's weight.
story: Found at the base of a cliff. Fisher uses the chain to pull his boat onto the shore.
image_description: Glowing silver chains that extend and retract as if alive.
back_story: The chains that bound Andromeda to the rock. They represent the hero's duty to protect the innocent.

abilities.name: Hero's Rescue
abilities.effect: Throw the chain to pull a distant ally to safety or a distant enemy into melee range.

hidden_name: The Quill of the High Flyer
description: A large, stiff feather that shimmers with an oily rainbow sheen.
story: Fisher found this on the docks. He wears it in his hat for good luck during storms.
image_description: A pure white, glowing primary feather from the wing of Pegasus.
back_story: A remnant of the divine stallion born from the blood of Medusa.

abilities.name: Pegasus Call
abilities.effect: Summon a spectral mount for fast travel across the memory biomes.

description: A blackened branch that smells of ozone and burnt air.
story: Fisher found this in a tree struck by lightning. It gives him a shock whenever he touches it.
image_description: A jagged, crystalline shard of pure electricity that crackles constantly.
back_story: A fragment of a thunderbolt thrown by Zeus to mark his son's victory.

abilities.name: Heaven's Wrath
abilities.effect: Channel the shard to call down a lightning strike on your current location.

description: A masterfully woven fishing net with lead weights. Very sturdy.
story: The primary tool of the Fisherman life. It has never let a catch go.
image_description: A golden-threaded net that expands to cover massive areas.
back_story: The net used by Dictys to pull Perseus from the sea. It represents the strength of the humble man.

abilities.name: Dictys' Kindness
abilities.effect: Non-lethally captures enemies, converting them into Memory Shards without a fight.
